sentences.en: A professional athlete built a palatial eight - bedroom home where he lives by himself.
sentences.cn: 有位职业运动员,造了一所富丽堂皇的房子,却独自居住.

sentences.en: After he retired , Shen bought a palatial mansion.
sentences.cn: 离职以后, 沈先生买了一座宫殿式的别墅.

sentences.en: Even when on a palatial scale a Chinese garden does not lose that intimate quality.
sentences.cn: 即便是皇家园林也不失这种亲密感.
他买了套富丽堂皇的大房子.

sentences.en: He shares this palatial apartment with me.
sentences.cn: 他和我合住这间宫殿一般的房间.

sentences.en: It is for Lot No.159 DD 384 , which is situated at the centre of Palatial Coast.
sentences.cn: 为丈量约份第384约地段第159号而设, 位处帝涛湾的中心.

sentences.en: Palatial office buildings are being constructed in the city.
sentences.cn: 那个城市正在兴建一些宫殿式办公大楼.

sentences.en: These palatial chambers, how marvellously they came to her.
sentences.cn: 这些宫殿般的房间多么奇妙地就到了她的手中.

sentences.en: We visited The Utah State Parliament building, it is a real palatial mansion!
sentences.cn: 我们在盐湖城先参观了犹他州议会大厦, 那真是一座丽堂皇的建筑!

words.tran_cn: 宫殿似的；宏伟的；壮丽的

trans.tran_cn: 宫殿（似）的，宏伟的，壮丽的
trans.tran_en: a palatial building etc is large and beautifully decorated
